title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Centers around a high school student who discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Set in a world where people with superpowers (known as Quirks) are the norm, a boy without them enrolls in a prestigious hero academy.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Follows the adventures of Ichigo Kurosaki after he obtains the powers of a Soul Reaper from another Soul Reaper, Rukia Kuchiki.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: A story about wizards in a magical guild.
